button.supertip: Convert external links inside the formulas into local addresses

button.label: Highlight blank cells
button.supertip: Sets color 8 for empty cells background

button.label: Highlight cells with blank values
button.supertip: Sets color 8 for cells contained formulas that return empty values

button.label: Cell color
button.supertip: The display in the pop-up window of the font color and filling the selected cell

button.label: Conditional formatting color
button.supertip: Displays in a pop-up window text and background color from conditional formatting rule applied to the cell

button.label: Reset column
button.supertip: Reset column width by default value

button.supertip: Reset the size of cell comment by default values

button.label: Text
button.supertip: Copy text value from cell into the clipboard

button.label: Copy dialog
button.screentip: Copies text from cells range with delimiter selection.
button.supertip: Coping text from selected cells into the clipboard and concatenating values with using a user-specified text delimiter

button.label: Number
button.supertip: Copy numerical value from cell to clipboard

button.label: Display text
button.screentip: Display cell text and copy to clipboard
button.supertip: Copy text value from cell into the clipboard with showing text into pop-up window

button.label: Formula
button.supertip: Copy formula from cell to clipboard in international format

button.label: Formula (local)
button.supertip: Copy formula from cell to clipboard in local format. In case of cells range, formulas combined using tabulation symbol as text delimiter.

button.label: Range address
button.supertip: Copy range address to clipboard

button.label: Cell address
button.supertip: Copy cell address to clipboard. In case of cells range, cells addresses combined using ; synmbol

button.label: Not empty cell address
button.screentip: Not empty cell address to clipboard
button.supertip: Copy not empty cell address to clipboard. In case of cells range, cells addresses combined using ; synmbol.

button.label: Paste from clipboard
button.supertip: Paste value into cell from clipboard

button.label: Prefix
button.supertip: Paste value into begin of cell text from clipboard

button.label: Suffix
button.supertip: Paste value into end of cell text from clipboard

button.label: Wrap into []
button.supertip: Wrap cell value into square brackets

button.label: Trim spaces
button.supertip: Removing leading, trailing and double spaces into the cell text

button.label: Strip whitespace
button.supertip: Strip whitespace (or other non-printed characters) from text in cell

button.label: Replace
button.supertip: Text replace with regular expression

button.label: Extract
button.supertip: Text extract using regular expression

button.label: Uppercase
button.supertip: Convert cell text to uppercase

button.label: Lowercase
button.supertip: Convert cell text to lowercase

button.label: Sentence case
button.supertip: Convert cell text to sentence case

button.label: Duplicate
button.supertip: Duplicate the current table row

button.label: Even remove
button.supertip: Deletes even lines in the selected range

button.label: Swap cells
button.supertip: Swaps ranges. It is necessary to select two areas (ranges) of the same size using the Ctrl key and run this procedure

button.label: In reverse
button.supertip: Rearranges list elements in reverse order

button.label: Row edit
button.supertip: Table row edit in dialog

button.label: Merge with text
button.supertip: Groupping selected cells with combined their values using user-defined delimiter

button.label: Merge groups
button.supertip: Separate groupping several selected ranges

button.label: Ungroup with replication
button.supertip: Ungroup with replication common text by cells

button.label: Select
button.supertip: Select empty rows in a table

button.label: Remove
button.supertip: Remove empty rows from table

button.label: Hide
button.supertip: Hide empty rows in a table

button.label: Duplicate
button.supertip: Duplicate empty rows in a table

button.label: Compare rows
button.supertip: Applies conditional formatting rules to two selected ranges for compare them

button.supertip: Displayed divisors of numerical value from selected cell
